00024 int VCon_root::getnelem(){
00025   if(!ev)  return -1;
00026   if( strstr(contname,"TrMCCluster"))
00027     return ev->fTrMCClusters.size();
00028   if( strstr(contname,"TrCluster"))
00029     return ev->fTrClusters.size();
00030   if( strstr(contname,"TrRawCluster"))
00031     return ev->fTrRawClusters.size();
00032   if( strstr(contname,"TrRecHit"))
00033     return ev->fTrRecHits.size();
00034   if( strstr(contname,"TrTrack"))
00035     return ev->fTrTracks.size();
00036 }

00038 void VCon_root::eraseC(){
00039  if(!ev)  return ;
00040   if( strstr(contname,"TrMCCluster"))
00041     return ev->ClearTrMCClusters(1);
00042   if( strstr(contname,"TrCluster"))
00043     return ev->ClearTrClusters(1);
00044   if( strstr(contname,"TrRawCluster"))
00045     return ev->ClearTrRawClusters(1);
00046   if( strstr(contname,"TrRecHit"))
00047     return ev->ClearTrRecHits(1);
00048   if( strstr(contname,"TrTrack"))
00049     return ev->ClearTrTracks(1);

00052 AMSlink* VCon_root::getelem(int ii){

00066 void  VCon_root::addnext(AMSlink* aa){
00067    if(!ev)  return ;
00068   if( strstr(contname,"TrMCCluster"))
00069     ev->AddTrMCCluster((TrMCClusterR*)aa);
00070   if( strstr(contname,"TrCluster"))
00071     ev->AddTrCluster((TrClusterR*)aa);
00072   if( strstr(contname,"TrRawCluster"))
00073     ev->AddTrRawCluster((TrRawClusterR*)aa);
00074   if( strstr(contname,"TrRecHit"))
00075     ev->AddTrRecHit((TrRecHitR*)aa);
00076   if( strstr(contname,"TrTrack"))
00077     ev->AddTrTrack((TrTrackR*)aa);

00081 int  VCon_root::getindex(AMSlink* aa){

00083  if( strstr(contname,"TrMCCluster"))
00084    for(int ii=0;ii<ev->fTrMCClusters.size();ii++)
